VettingEvaluation.name: VettingEvaluation
VettingEvaluation.description: Represents the evaluation of a candidate based on a vetting procedure.

ActionPlanId.description: The ID of the action plan for the vetting procedure that the vetting evaluation is based on.

ApplicationFormId.description: The ID of the application form associated with the vetting evaluation.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the vetting evaluation is no longer effective.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the vetting evaluation is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the vetting evaluation.

Outcome.description: Specifies the outcome of the vetting evaluation.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The reference record associated with the vetting evaluation.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the vetting evaluation.

VettingEndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the vetting evaluation.

VettingStartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the vetting evaluation.
